titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to give priority to reducing Federal tax refunds for all past-due child support before any other reductions allowed by law.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 6/6/2002--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to require that Federal tax refunds will be reduced for all past-due child support before any other reductions allowed by law.
